columns.actid: A unique identifier assigned to each activity in the table.
columns.activity_name: The name of the activity being described, such as sports or recreational events.

Activity.table_description: The Activity table stores information about various activities, each identified by a unique actid, along with their descriptive names.

columns.stuid: This column represents the unique identifier for a student participating in an activity.
columns.actid: This column denotes the unique identifier for an activity in which students are participating.

Participates_in.table_description: The Participates_in table serves to establish the relationship between students and the activities they are involved in.

columns.StuID: A unique identifier assigned to each student in the database.
columns.LName: The last name of the student.
columns.Fname: The first name of the student.
columns.Age: The age of the student at the time of data entry.
columns.Sex: The gender of the student, represented by a single character.
columns.Major: The identifier representing the major field of study the student is enrolled in.
columns.Advisor: The identifier of the academic advisor assigned to the student.
columns.city_code: The code representing the city of the student's residence.

Student.table_description: The Student table contains detailed information about students enrolled in the institution, including their personal details, academic major, assigned advisors, and residence information.

columns.FacID: The unique identifier for each faculty member.
columns.Lname: The last name of the faculty member.
columns.Fname: The first name of the faculty member.
columns.Rank: The academic rank or title of the faculty member, indicating their position within the institution.
columns.Sex: The gender of the faculty member, represented by a single character.
columns.Phone: The internal phone extension number assigned to the faculty member.
columns.Room: The room number where the faculty member's office is located.
columns.Building: The name of the building in which the faculty member's office is situated.

Faculty.table_description: The Faculty table stores information about faculty members at the institution, including their unique identifiers, names, academic ranks, gender, contact details, and physical office locations.

columns.FacID: This column represents the unique identifier for each faculty member participating in an activity.
columns.actid: This column indicates the unique identifier for each activity in which the faculty member is involved.

Faculty_Participates_in.table_description: The Faculty_Participates_in table tracks the relationships between faculty members and the activities they participate in, linking faculty identifiers to activity identifiers.
